definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: Only off Seal Island do 16-foot great white sharks regularly catapult themselves into the air in an effort to catch and kill these seals.
sentences.chinese: 在海豹岛附近海域，大白鲨常会从水中冲出猎杀海狗。

sentences.english: A handful eventually reached the Mediterranean by swimming eastwards through the Straits of Gibraltar.
sentences.chinese: 少数大白鲨经直布罗陀海峡，最终向东游到了地中海。

sentences.english: The one-year-old shark is the longest surviving great white in captivity.
sentences.chinese: 该一岁的鲨鱼，是圈养大白鲨中存活最久的。

sentences.english: However, great white sharks don't actually have a taste for human flesh4.
sentences.chinese: 不过大白鲨其实并不喜欢吃人肉。

sentences.english: It's the sin of greed that brings the monster, the Jaws, the shark, into Amity.
sentences.chinese: 正是贪婪的罪恶把魔怪大白鲨引到镇上来。

sentences.english: The great white-shark of computing doing the suburban dad routine!?
sentences.chinese: 那个伟大的计算机界大白鲨过着小镇父亲的平凡生活？

sentences.english: Jaws are aluminum bronze alloy and T-Slot style to prevent jaw breakage.
sentences.chinese: 大白鲨是铝青铜合金T型槽的风格，以防止颌骨断裂。

sentences.english: Great white sharks in the wild have a huge range of migration, sometimes traveling 50 miles a day.
sentences.chinese: 野外的大白鲨活范围很大，有时一天可游50英里。

sentences.english: The white-hot trail of Jaws, I was over in Kentucky.
sentences.chinese: 《大白鲨》热放的时候我住在肯德基。

sentences.english: But did you know great white sharks can breach as well?
sentences.chinese: 但你知道大白鲨也能鲸跃吗？

sentences.english: These sharks aren't the ferocious creatures we see in Jaws.
sentences.chinese: 这些鲨鱼并不像我们在《大白鲨》里看到的那样凶残。

definition: man-eating shark/same as 大白鯊|大白鲨[da4 bai2 sha1], great white shark (Carcharodon carcharias)
